name: Arcane Trickster
description: Arcane Tricksters enhance their skills of stealth and agility with magic, learning enchantment and illusion spells. These rogues include pickpockets, burglars, pranksters, and adventurers.

spellcasting.description: Starting at 3rd level, you augment your martial prowess with the ability to cast spells.

initial: Two other cantrips of your choice from the wizard spell list
cantrips.additional: Learn another wizard cantrip at 10th level.

initial: Three 1st-level wizard spells of your choice, two of which must be from enchantment or illusion spells.
level_up: Learn one new spell of 1st or 2nd level at 7th level.
Spells learned at 8th, 14th, and 20th level can come from any school of magic.
Replace one known wizard spell with another from the wizard spell list when gaining a level.

spellcasting_ability.description: Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for your wizard spells.
spellcasting_ability.spell_save_dc: 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Intelligence modifier
spellcasting_ability.spell_attack_modifier: Your proficiency bonus + your Intelligence modifier

mage_hand_legerdemain.description: At 3rd level, when you cast Mage Hand, you can make the hand invisible and perform additional tasks.
tasks: Stow an object the hand is holding in a container worn or carried by another creature.
Retrieve an object in a container worn or carried by another creature.
Use thieves' tools to pick locks and disarm traps at range.
mage_hand_legerdemain.stealth_check: You can perform these tasks without being noticed if you succeed on a Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check contested by the creature's Wisdom (Perception) check.
mage_hand_legerdemain.bonus_action: You can use the bonus action granted by your Cunning Action to control the hand.

magical_ambush.description: At 9th level, if you are hidden from a creature when you cast a spell on it, the creature has disadvantage on any saving throw it makes against the spell this turn.

versatile_trickster.description: At 13th level, you can use Mage Hand to distract targets.
versatile_trickster.mechanics: As a bonus action, you can designate a creature within 5 feet of the hand to gain advantage on attack rolls against that creature until the end of the turn.

spell_thief.description: At 17th level, you can steal the knowledge of a spell from another spellcaster.
spell_thief.mechanics: After a creature casts a spell targeting you or including you in its area of effect, you can use your reaction to force the creature to make a saving throw. On a failed save, you negate the spell's effect against you and steal the spell knowledge if it is at least 1st level and of a level you can cast. You know the spell for 8 hours, and the creature can't cast it during this time.
spell_thief.recharge: Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.
